==Events==
*[[63 BC]] &ndash; [[Cicero]] gives the fourth and final of the [[Catiline Orations]].
* [[633]] &ndash; [[Fourth Council of Toledo]] takes place.
*[[1082]] &ndash; [[Ramon Berenguer II, Count of Barcelona]] is [[Assassination|assassinated]].
*[[1408]] &ndash; Emir [[Edigu]] of [[Golden Horde]] reaches [[Moscow]].
*[[1484]] &ndash; [[Pope Innocent VIII]] issues the ''[[Summis desiderantes]]'', a [[papal bull]] that deputizes [[Heinrich Kramer]] and [[James Sprenger]] as [[inquisition|inquisitors]] to root out alleged [[witchcraft]] in [[Germany]].
*[[1492]] &ndash; [[Christopher Columbus]] becomes the first [[Europe]]an to set foot on the island of [[Hispaniola]] (now [[Haiti]] and the [[Dominican Republic]]).
*[[1496]] &ndash; King [[Manuel I of Portugal]] issues a decree of expulsion of "heretics" from the country.
*[[1757]] &ndash; [[Seven Years' War]]: [[Battle of Leuthen]] &ndash; [[Frederick II of Prussia]] leads [[Prussia]]n forces to a decisive victory over [[Austria]]n forces under [[Prince Charles Alexander of Lorraine]].
*[[1766]] &ndash; In [[London]], [[Christie's|James Christie]] holds his first sale.
*[[1775]] &ndash; At [[Fort Ticonderoga]], [[Henry Knox]] begins his historic [[Noble train of artillery|transport of artillery]] to [[Cambridge, Massachusetts]].
*[[1815]] &ndash; Foundation of [[Maceió]], [[Brazil]].
*[[1831]] &ndash; Former U.S. President [[John Quincy Adams]] takes his seat in the [[United States House of Representatives|House of Representatives]].
*[[1847]] &ndash; [[Jefferson Davis]] is elected to the U.S. senate, his first political post.
*[[1848]] &ndash; [[California Gold Rush]]: In a message to the [[Congress of the United States|U.S. Congress]], U.S. President [[James K. Polk]] confirms that large amounts of gold had been discovered in [[California]].
*[[1865]] &ndash; [[Chincha Islands War]]: [[Peru]] allies with [[Chile]] against [[Spain]].
*[[1876]] &ndash; The [[Brooklyn Theater Fire]] kills at least 278 people in [[Brooklyn]], New York.
*[[1920]] &ndash; [[Dimitrios Rallis]] forms a government in [[Greece]].
*[[1932]] &ndash; [[Germany|German]]-born [[Swiss (people)|Swiss]] [[physicist]] [[Albert Einstein]] is granted an American [[visa (document)|visa]].
*[[1933]] &ndash; [[Prohibition in the United States]] ends: [[Utah]] becomes the 36th [[U.S. state]] to ratify the [[Twenty-first Amendment to the United States Constitution]], thus establishing the required 75% of states needed to enact the amendment. (This overturned the [[Eighteenth Amendment to the United States Constitution|18th Amendment]] which had made the manufacture, sale, or transportation of alcohol illegal in the United States.)
*[[1934]] &ndash; [[Abyssinia Crisis]]: [[History of Italy as a monarchy and in the World Wars|Italian]] troops attack Wal Wal in [[Ethiopia|Abyssinia]], taking four days to capture the city.
*[[1936]] &ndash; The [[Soviet Union]] adopts a new [[1936 Soviet Constitution|constitution]] and the [[Kirghiz SSR|Kirghiz Soviet Socialist Republic]] is established as a full [[Republics of the Soviet Union|Union Republic]] of the [[Soviet Union|USSR]].
*[[1941]] &ndash; [[World War II]]: In the [[Battle of Moscow]], [[Georgy Zhukov]] launches a massive Soviet counter-attack against the German army, with the biggest offensive launched against Army Group Centre.
*  1941   &ndash; World War II: [[Great Britain]] declares war on [[Finland]], [[Hungary]] and [[Romania]].
*[[1943]] &ndash; World War II: U.S. Army Air Force begins attacking [[Germany]]'s secret weapons bases in [[Operation Crossbow]].
*[[1945]] &ndash; [[Flight 19]] is lost in the [[Bermuda Triangle]].
*[[1952]] &ndash; [[Great Smog of 1952]]: A cold fog descends upon London, combining with air pollution and killing at least 12,000 in the weeks and months that follow.
*[[1955]] &ndash; The [[American Federation of Labor]] and the [[Congress of Industrial Organizations]] merge and form the [[AFL-CIO]].
*  1955   &ndash; [[E.D. Nixon]] and [[Rosa Parks]] lead the [[Montgomery Bus Boycott]].
*[[1957]] &ndash; [[Sukarno]] expels all Dutch people from [[Indonesia]].
*[[1958]] &ndash; [[Subscriber trunk dialling|Subscriber Trunk Dialling (STD)]] is inaugurated in the [[United Kingdom]] by [[Elizabeth II of the United Kingdom|Queen Elizabeth II]] when she speaks to the [[Lord Provost]] in a call from [[Bristol]] to [[Edinburgh]].
*  1958   &ndash; The [[Preston By-pass]], the [[United Kingdom|UK]]'s first stretch of [[motorway]], opens to traffic for the first time. (It is now part of the [[M6 motorway|M6]] and [[M55 motorway|M55]] motorways.)
*[[1964]] &ndash; [[Vietnam War]]: For his heroism in battle earlier in the year, Captain [[Roger Donlon]] is awarded the first [[Medal of Honor]] of the war.
*[[1969]] &ndash; The four node [[ARPANET]] network is established.
*[[1977]] &ndash; [[Egypt]] breaks diplomatic relations with [[Syria]], [[Libya]], [[Algeria]], [[Iraq]] and [[South Yemen]]. The move is in retaliation for the Declaration of Tripoli against Egypt.
*[[1978]] &ndash; The [[Soviet Union]] signs a "friendship treaty" with the [[Democratic Republic of Afghanistan]].
*[[1983]] &ndash; Dissolution of the [[National Reorganization Process|Military Junta]] in [[Argentina]].
*[[1993]] &ndash; The mayor of [[Vienna]], [[Helmut Zilk]], is injured by a [[letter bomb]].
*[[1995]] &ndash; [[Sri Lankan Civil War]]: The [[Sri Lanka]]n government announces the conquest of the [[Tamil people|Tamil]] stronghold of [[Jaffna]].
*[[2004]] &ndash; The [[Civil Partnership Act]] comes into effect in the [[United Kingdom]], and the first [[Civil partnerships in the United Kingdom|civil partnership]] is registered there.
*[[2005]] &ndash; The [[2005 Lake Tanganyika earthquake|Lake Tanganyika earthquake]] causes significant damage, mostly in the [[Democratic Republic of the Congo]].
*[[2006]] &ndash; Commodore [[Frank Bainimarama]] overthrows the government in [[Fiji]].
*[[2007]] &ndash; [[Westroads Mall massacre]]: A gunman opens fire with a [[semi-automatic rifle]] at an [[Omaha, Nebraska]], mall, killing eight people before taking his own life.
*[[2012]] &ndash; At least 8 people are killed and 12 others injured after a 5.6 [[2012 Zohan earthquake|earthquake]] strikes [[Iran]]'s [[South Khorasan Province]].
